g++   -fpermissive -std=c++0x -Wall -O3 -lm -DNSDEBUG   CMakeFiles/fast_mergesort.dir/fast_mergesort.cpp.o  -o fast_mergesort  -L/lib64/libhwloc.so -rdynamic ../../src/runtime/libdarts.a ../../src/abstractmachine/libamm.a -lhwloc ../../src/rsmanager/librsmanager.a ../../src/common/libcommon.a -lpthread ../../src/threading/libcodelet.a ../../src/scheduler/libscheduler.a ../../src/threadlocal/libthreadlocal.a -lrt -ltbb -Wl,-rpath,/lib64/libhwloc.so
